name: RYWO - 3D roll ball
description:
Are you ready for challenging adventure? 
RYWO is a 3D balance game. Control player (ball) and find way though challenging levels full of various traps. Collect coins, upgrade and finish all of levels.
This will not be easy, but practice and patience will help you.

Controls are pretty simple. You can choose one of two options:

  • Accelerometer based control logic. Roll the ball by tilting your mobile device. Jump with tap on screen. 
  • On screen controller. Joystick on the left side of a screen and jump button on the right.

What you can find in the game:

  • Accurate ball physic simulation
  • 10 types of balls (players) (more soon)
  • 24 levels (more soon)
  • 4 skills for update
  • Levels that will test your skills
  • Hidden treasures
  • Nice music
  • Hard levels and even harder levels

For news about game, please, visit https://rywo.tumblr.com/ or https://www.facebook.com/rywogame
